summary: The Z-Fighters must stop a mad scientist out to take over the world.
cast: Masako Nozawa|Toshio Furukawa|Mayumi Tanaka|Hiromi Tsuru|Kôhei Miyauchi|Mayumi Shô|Naoki Tatsuta|Kenji Utsumi|Kôji Yada|Yukimasa Kishino|Ken Yamaguchi|Daisuke Gôri|Kôji Nakata|Jôji Yanami
title: Dragon Ball Z: El más fuerte del mundo
